## LightEventPayloads."LIGHT.SET\_PENUMBRA" property

Emitted when the penumbra of the spotlight is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[LightEvent.SET_PENUMBRA]: {
        light: Light;
        penumbra: number;
    };
```
